ygData.subject: Re: where in Neriak is enchant silver
ygData.msgSnippet: In the third zone  (Called 3rd gate) there is a library.  I recall it having big wide steps and a blue neon symbol.  The center vendor on the first floor of
ygData.messageBody:
In the third zone (Called 3rd gate) there is a library. I recall it
having big wide steps and a blue neon symbol. The center vendor on the
first floor of the library has all the enchante metal spells. Anyone
can buy them, but you can only carry one copy of each spell in your
inventory, including the bank I think, so don't try to buy one for a
friend too.

--- Scott <s.fog@...> wrote:
> From: "Scott" <s.fog@...>
>
> Im in Neriak now and cant seem to find the spell
> enchant silver. Need a name
> and place if possible, and can a nonenchanter buy
> the spell im in there with
> my other character who is a troll warrior.
>
>
>
